archimate:Requirement.name: SA.1.2.1: Arrangements should be made to restrict access to systems, business applications, networks, collaboration platforms and endpoint devices, by all types of individual or system accounts(e.g. business users, individuals running systems, API user accounts, IT specialists, such as technical support staff and individuals from external parties.)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
